prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Phyllis Umberger Drawings, Mss. Collection # 2010.1, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Mary B. Kegley in 2009; part of the Mary B. Kegley Collection.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Phyllis Morehead Umberger, the daughter of Dr. Robert C. Morehead and Julia Owens Morehead, was born 3 July 1925 in Wytheville, Virginia. She married Dan F. Umberger and had two sons, Jonathan Guy Umberger and James L. Coen Jr. She was a member of Holy Trinity Lutheran Church and a art teacher. She died 11 July 2009 in Wytheville and is buried at St. John's Lutheran Church Cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of four pen and ink drawings on board, commissioned by Mary B. Kegley, probably in the 1970s.
